import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { addToCart } from '../actions/cartActions' import Message from '../components/Message' const CartScreen = () => { // 移除了 match 和 history，因为我们会使用 useParams 和 useNavigate const { id: productId } = useParams() // 使用 useParams 获取路由参数 const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() // 使用 useLocation 获取查询字符串 const qty = location.search ? Number(new URLSearchParams(location.search).get('qty')) : 1 const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart || { cartItems: [] } useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty)) } }, [dispatch, productId, qty]) return (

购物车

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( 购物为空返回主页 ) : ( {cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.price} dispatch( addToCart(item.product, Number(e.target.value)) ) } > {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map((i) => ( ))} ))} )}

共计({cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty, 0)})个产品

¥{cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty * item.price, 0)} ) } export default CartScreen
